shortDescription: Battle your friends in S.K.A.T.E., discover skate spots, and climb the leaderboard.
fullDescription:
SkateHubba is the ultimate skateboarding app. Challenge friends to real-time S.K.A.T.E. battles with video proof, explore an interactive map of skate spots, and climb the global leaderboard.

KEY FEATURES:
- S.K.A.T.E. Battles — Set tricks and film your attempts. Both players vote on landed vs bailed.
- Spot Map — Discover and check in at skate parks, street spots, and DIY builds near you.
- Video Challenges — Send trick-video challenges to friends with deadlines and one-take rules.
- Leaderboards — Track your wins, streaks, and ranking against skaters worldwide.
- Push Notifications — Get notified when it's your turn or someone sends a challenge.

Whether you're warming up at the local park or hunting new spots across town, SkateHubba keeps the session going.
